Tests event listeners output in the Elements sidebar panel.

Inspect Me

    passive: false
    once: false
    handler: function documentClickHandler(event) { console.log("click - document - attribute"); }

    passive: false
    once: false
    handler: function () { console.log("click - document - handleEvent"); }
